definition: ordinal number/day of a month/mark/sign/business establishment/size/ship suffix/horn (wind instrument)/bugle call/assumed name/to take a pulse/classifier used to indicate number of people

sentences.english: I can find the zip code in the phone book.
sentences.chinese: 我可以在電話簿上找到郵遞區號。

sentences.english: This information can be found by using your zip code or IP address.
sentences.chinese: 這方面的資料可以發現，用您的郵遞區號或IP地址。

sentences.english: DDD calls . Please dial "9"first, then the area code and the telephone number .
sentences.chinese: 撥打國內長途，請先撥“9”再撥區號和電話號碼。

sentences.english: Do the same for the shipping postal code.
sentences.chinese: 對郵遞區號進行同樣的操作。

sentences.english: In Great Britain, the code for international telephone calls is 010.
sentences.chinese: 在英國，國際電話區號是零一零。

sentences.english: New York city, the area code is 212.
Search by city or postal code for a store near you.
sentences.chinese: 按城市或郵遞區號搜尋附近的店鋪。

sentences.english: You must dail area code when you call Lily.
sentences.chinese: 打電話給莉莉時一定要撥區號。

sentences.english: Well, I wrote Illinois zip codes on the out-of -state addresses.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，我把伊利諾的郵遞區號，寫在別州的地址上。

sentences.english: Tell me the ZIP code and I'll tell you what kind of college a high-school graduate most likely attends.
sentences.chinese: 告訴我區號，我就會告訴你高中生會讀哪些大學。

sentences.english: You must enter the area code for this location.
sentences.chinese: 您必須鍵入這個位置的區號。

definition: consecutive serial numbers/chain (of supermarkets, hotels etc)/hyphen
lit. to give medicine to a dead horse (idiom)/fig. to keep trying everything in a desperate situation
pinyin: si3 ma3 dang4 huo2 ma3 yi1

definition: to get straight to the point (idiom)
